00150     <?php
00151     $Row= 1;
00152     foreach ($Credits as $Software) {
00153         $Class= $Row++ % 2 == 0 ? 'evenline' : 'oddline';
00154         ?>
00155         <tr class="<?php echo $Class ?>">
00156             <td class="creditstitle">
00157                 <?php echo $Software['Name'] ?>
00158             </td>
00159             <td>
00160                 <?php echo _($Software['Desc']) ?>
00161             </td>
00162             <td class="none">
00163                 <a href="<?php echo $Software['Link'] ?>" name="<?php echo $Software['Name'] ?>"><img src="<?php echo $IMG_PATH.'credits/'.$Software['Img'] ?>" name="<?php echo $Software['Name'] ?>" alt="<?php echo $Software['Name'] ?>" border="0"></a>
